cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.CC. 

The paper discusses the confidentiality of Information Dispersal Algorithms (IDAs) and their erasure codes, which are commonly used in secure storage and transmission of data files in distributed systems. This topic falls under the scope of computer security (cs.CR), information theory (cs.IT), distributed computing (cs.DC), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and cryptography (cs.CC).
